property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager는 소프트웨어 패키지를 설치 및 유지보수하는 데 사용할 수 있는 도구입니다.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager - это инструмент для установки и обслуживания пакетов ПО.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager -asennusohjelman avulla voit asentaa ohjelmistopaketit ja niiden päivitykset.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager er et verktøy du kan bruke til å installere og vedlikeholde programvarepakkene dine.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager ist ein Tool, mit dem Sie Ihre Softwarepakete installieren und verwalten können.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager 是可讓您用來安裝和維護軟體套件的工具。

property.name: Offering.description

property.value: IBM Installation Manager er et værktøj, du kan bruge til at installere og vedligeholde dine softwarepakker.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager je nástroj, ktorý môžete používať na inštaláciu a údržbu vašich softvérových balíkov.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager は、ソフトウェア・パッケージをインストールおよび保守するために使用できるツールです。

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: يعد IBM Installation Manager أداة يمكنك استخدامها لتركيب وصيانة مجموعات البرامج للبرنامج الخاص بك.

property.value: IBM Installation Manager est un outil qui permet d'installer et de tenir à jour les packages de logiciel.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager è uno strumento che può essere utilizzato per installare e gestire i package di software.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager je alat koji možete koristiti za instaliranje i održavanje svojih softverskih paketa.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: The IBM® Installation Manager is a tool that you can use to install and maintain your software packages.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: Το IBM Installation Manager είναι ένα εργαλείο που μπορείτε να χρησιμοποιήσετε για την εγκατάσταση και συντήρηση των πακέτων λογισμικού σας.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager är ett verktyg som du kan använda för att installera och underhålla dina programvarupaket.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager is een hulpprogramma voor installatie en onderhoud van uw softwarepakketten.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager, yazılım paketlerinizi kurmak ve bakımını yapmak için kullanabileceğiniz bir araçtır.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: Program IBM Installation Manager to narzędzie używane do instalowania i konserwowania pakietów oprogramowania.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager je orodje, s katerim lahko nameščate in vzdržujete pakete programske opreme.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: O IBM Installation Manager é uma ferramenta que pode ser usada para instalar e manter pacotes de software.

property.name: Offering.description
property.value: IBM Installation Manager คือเครื่องมือที่คุณสามารถใช้เพื่อติดตั้งและรักษาแพ็จเกจซอฟต์แวร์ของคุณ

property.value: Produkt IBM Installation Manager je nástroj, který lze použít k instalaci a údržbě softwarových balíků.

property.name: Offering.description

property.value: IBM Installation Manager הוא כלי שתוכלו להשתמש בו להתקנה ותחזוקה של מארזי התוכנה שלכם.
